product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content:
Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter is a great product for someone who needs to look good in a hurry. I love the versatility it offers! You can use it on your eyes, cheeks and lips for a simple, yet beautiful and on-trend look. The formula applies easily and feels smooth and luxurious while having adequate/buildable pigmentation that doesn’t emphasize texture. Unfortunately, the shade I was sent (Haute Couture) isn’t exactly a winner on my fair, cool-toned skin when applied on my lips and cheeks. It has an orangey base that would look gorgeous on someone warmer-toned than me! I suggest using an eyelid primer before applying it as an eyeshadow to prevent creasing. This was my favorite way to wear Le Monochromatique! The packaging looks like what you’d expect from Lancôme, but I dislike the bulkiness of it. The extra space in the lid seems unnecessary and makes what a is supposed to be a portable product less portable! Overall, I could definitely see myself purchasing this product in another shade and recommend it to anyone who wants a multi-use makeup product that allows them to pull a look together quickly.

review_content: At first I really liked the idea of being able to use it as lip color, eye color, and a blush but in reality it didn't look all that great as blush or lip color. It's very bold and a little bit goes a long way.  I received this product as a free sample

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I love this for use on my cheeks. The pink is super flattering and perfect for a date. I really like how easy the application and blending is, the powder itself is silky smooth and a little goes a long way! I use it as eyeshadow too sometimes if I want a pop of color on my lids.

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Hazel', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Olive', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This product is awesome. I received this right before I went on a trip and I only needed this. I used it as a blush, eyeshadow (when I actually wore eye shadow) and a lip tint. It works on all accounts. It is a little dark so a little goes a long way. I use it every day but it builds so I could easily turn it into a night look as well. This is corny but it felt like the swiss army knife of makeup lol.

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Brunette', 'Skin Tone Medium', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: Absolutely beautiful on eyelids, not so much on cheeks unfortunately. Find myself reaching for it on days I don’t want bare eyelids but also don’t want to work too hard on my eyeshadow

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: This shadow is super pigmented and goes on silky smooth. I loved being able to built it to a darker, more intense shade and it still blended out beautifully without losing pigment.

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Blue', 'Hair color Red', 'Skin Tone Fair', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_content: I love the diversity of one product! I love being able to use one product for multiple looks. I received this from influenster for an honest review.

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Age 25-34', 'Eye Color Brown', 'Hair color Black', 'Skin Tone Tan', 'Skin Type Dry']
review_title: Only thing you need in your purse
review_content: This duo eyeshadow and highlighter is amazing. They color payoff is intense. I love that you can use it no only for your eyes but cheeks and lips too! My favorite way to use it was on the cheeks with a fluffy brush. Whatever was left on the brush I would sweep it across my eyelids for a fast finished look. I’m a mom so that’s a bonus for me. I always keeps this in my purse for quick touch ups.

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Light', 'Skin Type Combination']
review_content: I love this product! I think it is absolutely flawless when applied to the skin. It has great pigment and really makes a bold statement. It also looks beautiful applied on top of lip products to add a shimmer effect!

product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
review_content: This product is cool but be warned - if your not great with makeup, this product is VERY pigmented and will show easily if your not careful. I typically use as blush and eye color. Works! Just would not give 5 stars as the pigment is intense.

review_content: Really really wanted to love this product. Unfortunately, it was the opposite. product_name: Lancôme Le Monochromatique Eyeshadow and Highlighter
user_specs: ['Eye Color Green', 'Hair color Blonde', 'Skin Tone Porcelain', 'Skin Type Combination']
